name: The Cake Is A Lie (MaratG2)
description:
Explore and solve different puzzle-designed levels to find the cake.           

Controls:

LMB - blue portal
RMB - red portal
R to restart the level
'+' and '-' to adjust the volume.

Game made by Marat Gazizulin (scripts, level design),  Mikhail Rodnov (audio, level design),  Ian Ushakov (graphics).
